mapper.sql: id, ds_name, instance_name, ds_type, status, ds_desc, topic, ctrl_topic, schema_topic, split_topic, master_url, slave_url, dbus_user, dbus_pwd, update_time, ds_partition
mapper.delete: delete td,ts,tt,tc,tv,tm from t_dbus_datasource td left join t_data_schema ts on td.id = ts.ds_id left join t_data_tables tt on ts.id = tt.schema_id left join t_encode_columns tc on tt.id=tc.table_id left join t_meta_version tv on tt.id = tv.table_id left join t_table_meta tm on tv.id = tm.ver_id where td.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_dbus_datasource (ds_name, ds_type, instance_name, status, ds_desc, topic, ctrl_topic, schema_topic, split_topic, master_url, slave_url, dbus_user, dbus_pwd, update_time, ds_partition) values (#{dsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctrlTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemaTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slaveUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbusUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbusPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dsPartition,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT d.id, d.ds_name name, d.ds_type type, d.status, d.topic, d.ds_desc description, d.update_time updateTime, a.alias FROM t_dbus_datasource d left join t_name_alias_mapping a on d.ds_name = a.name and d.id = a.name_id and a.type = 2
d.ds_name LIKE "%"#{dsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" AND d.ds_type LIKE "%"#{dsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
ORDER BY
${sortBy} d.id
${order} DESC
mapper.update: update t_dbus_datasource td left join t_data_schema ts on td.id = ts.ds_id left join t_data_tables tt on ts.id = tt.schema_id set td.status=#{status}, td.update_time = current_timestamp(), ts.status=#{status}, tt.status =#{status} where td.id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id dsId,ds_name,ds_type,concat(ds_type,'/',ds_name) dsTypeName, ctrl_topic,master_url, slave_url,dbus_user,dbus_pwd from t_dbus_datasource
select * from t_dbus_datasource where ds_type like "%"#{dsType}"%"
SELECT d.* FROM t_dbus_datasource d, t_data_schema s WHERE d.id = s.ds_id AND s.id = #{schemaId}
